column2: 「want of rain, drought,」「failure of the inundation」
「uneatable, not good for food,」「not eaten,」「not eaten」「without eating,」
「of」「like flowers, blooming, fresh,」「vegetable」「animal」「flavoured with flowers,」「of lilies,」「flowered, bright-coloured,」「gay-coloured dresses」「in motley,」

「not diawn hither and thither, not distracted」「hindered,」「freedom from distractions,」「guarantee against annoyance」「not able to be roused by」「uninterrupted, free from digressions,」「the fact of」「not passing from hand to hand,」「continually,」
「serve, work for hire,」「canvass, intrigue for office,」「compete with,」「indulge in petty intrigue,」
